weekly_report.title: 📊 Ugentlig Watchdog Rapport
weekly_report._1: Her er en oversigt over mærkeret brugere og appeller til den sidste uge. Hold dit fællesskab ren!

dmEmbed.title: ⚠️ You Have Been Flagged
dmEmbed._1: If you are receiving this message, you are flagged in **{{member_guild_name}}** by **Stachio**.

_3._2: You have automatically been assigned a restricted role.
_3._3: You are permanently banned from this server.
_3._4: You have been kicked from this server.

dmEmbed._5: Join the **Stachio Discord** to appeal or learn more.
dmEmbed.footer: This is an automated system message
